title: Using `bor-mainnet` chain throws error
body:
Hello Team,

I have heimdall chain fully synced and using erigon with `bor-mainnet`. It throws 
```
Retrying again in 5 seconds for next Heimdall span path=bor/span/0
```
```
curl 127.0.0.1:26657/status
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": "",
  "result": {
    "node_info": {
      "protocol_version": {
        "p2p": "7",
        "block": "10",
        "app": "0"
      },
      "id": "e9f8a7d7248733def9779f2c6f898177a4642339",
      "listen_addr": "tcp://0.0.0.0:26656",
      "network": "heimdall-137",
      "version": "0.32.7",
      "channels": "4020212223303800",
      "moniker": "ip-172-31-82-30",
      "other": {
        "tx_index": "on",
        "rpc_address": "tcp://127.0.0.1:26657"
      }
    },
    "sync_info": {
      "latest_block_hash": "32858B3CBA626815302C7C923078D3884524FDA2BEAD41DDC7EDE5EB6FCEC32E",
      "latest_app_hash": "0CEDDB4CB03835ABDD0BA1C337D39F8AA641CEAEFE087527BEF0F9069EBF8F23",
      "latest_block_height": "9408605",
      "latest_block_time": "2022-05-17T18:24:36.868545326Z",
      "catching_up": false
    },
    "validator_info": {
      "address": "DA33CF2D92A4035AB7F67FBE7CF39518BA65F536",
      "pub_key": {
        "type": "tendermint/PubKeySecp256k1",
        "value": "BJFwJTDh8ONUiNj1MSq8+e3HOwMe80VLcCM+x2KVVRDJwx3IvE8pWigXDkhjqQZv/1VoXtpBBKtKh4vISTnHBNQ="
      },
      "voting_power": "0"
    }
  }
```
```
$ uname -a
5.11.0-1022-aws #23~20.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Mon Nov 15 14:04:48 UTC 2021 aarch64 aarch64 aarch64 GNU/Linux
```

```
erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-0929df89
```


```
[INFO] [05-15|21:15:10.743] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 137 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 0 EIP158: 0 Byzantium: 0 Constantinople: 0 Petersburg: 0 Istanbul: 3395000, Muir Glacier: 3395000, Berlin: 14750000, London: 23850000, Arrow Glacier: <nil>, Terminal Total Difficulty: <nil>, Engine: bor}" genesis=0xa9c28ce2141b56c474f1dc504bee9b01eb1bd7d1a507580d5519d4437a97de1b
[INFO] [05-15|21:15:10.752] Initialising Ethereum protocol           network=137

[INFO] [05-15|21:15:10.763] new subscription to logs established
```

CLI flags
```
[
  "rpcdaemon",
  "--http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon",
  "--datadir=~/.local/share/erigon",
  "--private.api.addr=erigon:9090",
  "--txpool.api.addr=erigon:9090",
  "--http.addr=0.0.0.0",
  "--http.vhosts=*",
  "--http.corsdomain=*",
  "--http.api=eth,debug,net",
  "--ws"
]
[
  "downloader",
  "--torrent.download.rate=1gb",
  "--datadir=~/.local/share/erigon",
  "--downloader.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9093"
]

[
  "erigon",
  "--chain=bor-mainnet",
  "--prune=hrtc",
  "--prune.h.older",
  "5000",
  "--prune.r.older",
  "5000",
  "--prune.t.older",
  "5000",
  "--prune.c.older",
  "5000",
  "--torrent.download.rate=1gb",
  "--datadir=~/.local/share/erigon",
  "--private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090",
  "--downloader.api.addr=downloader:9093",
  "--metrics",
  "--metrics.addr=0.0.0.0",
  "--metrics.port=6060",
  "--pprof",
  "--pprof.addr=0.0.0.0",
  "--pprof.port=6061"
]
```


Thanks
